description:
Cerwin Vega - Vice President of Sales

Location: Los Angeles, CA

About Cerwin Vega

Cerwin Vega: www.cerwinvega.com is a leading manufacturer of high-performance audio speakers, renowned for their power, clarity, and innovation. With a rich heritage dating back to 1954, Cerwin Vega continues to push the boundaries of sound reproduction, delivering exceptional experiences for music lovers and audiophiles worldwide.

About the Role

Cerwin Vega is seeking a seasoned and dynamic Vice President of Sales to lead our national sales efforts and propel our brand to new heights. In this critical role, you will be responsible for developing and executing a comprehensive sales strategy that drives revenue growth, expands market share, and strengthens our position as a leader in the audio speaker industry.

Responsibilities:

Lead and motivate a high-performing sales team, fostering a culture of collaboration and exceeding sales targets

Develop and implement strategic sales plans to achieve revenue goals, market share objectives, and profitability targets

Establish new inroads and manage strong relationships with key distributors, retailers (including Best Buy, Guitar Center, etc.), and other industry partners

Develop and execute targeted sales campaigns to drive brand awareness and product demand

Analyze market trends and competitor activity, identifying new sales opportunities and crafting strategies to capitalize on them

Oversee sales forecasting and budgeting processes, ensuring accuracy and alignment with business goals

Manage pricing strategies and promotional activities to optimize sales performance

Support product launches by developing effective sales training programs and marketing materials

Regularly communicate sales performance data and insights to senior management

Qualifications:

Minimum 10+ years of experience in B2B sales leadership within the consumer electronics or audio equipment industry

Proven track record of exceeding sales targets and achieving revenue growth

Strong understanding of the audio speaker market, distribution channels, and customer buying behavior

Extensive experience building and managing high-performing sales teams

Excellent communication, presentation, and negotiation skills

Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities

Ability to travel domestically as required

Proven success in developing and implementing strategic sales plans

Deep network of established relationships with key decision-makers at major audio equipment retailers and distributors (including Best Buy, Guitar Center, etc.)

Benefits:

Cerwin Vega offers a competitive compensation package.

You will also have the opportunity to work in a dynamic and exciting environment, surrounded by passionate audio enthusiasts and contribute to the legacy of a legendary brand.

To Apply

Please submit your resume and cover letter to hr@cerwinvega.com

We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status. And written communication skills

Apply to hr@cerwinvega.com
